thread.title: Live Cricket Score - India vs Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4, Ranchi
thread.title_full: Live Cricket Score - India vs Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4, Ranchi

title: Live Cricket Score - India vs Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4, Ranchi
text:
India vs Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4, Ranchi  31   Pujara defied Australia on day three © BCCI 
The match so far: 
There has been little separating the two teams as yet. Cummins bent his back on a flat pitch to provide some sting. Pujara defied Australia all through the day and remains unbeaten still. India still trail by 91 with four wickets in hand. There needs to be rapid progress sometime today for the match to yield a result and that is likely to happen with the pitch opening up. © Cricbuzz
